title: Bug 41666IfUnmodifiedSince failure
EB: The IfUnmodifiedSince header doesn't work enoughly.failed case: The IfUnmodifiedSince header value: 1000000(milliseconds) The lastModified value of target resource: 1001000(milliseconds)In this case, the response's status code should be SCPRECONDITIONFAILED,but the result is not so.caused by:In DefaultServletcheckIfUnmodifiedSince:if ( lastModified(headerValue + 1000)) {I think it should be:if ( lastModified = (headerValue + 1000)) {
